column5: Just thought I would post a few pics taken last summer. What better time to post summer pics than in January?  One of many many perch.   approaching the first Trent/Severn lock N. of Couchiching.   Some boats in the lock after the water has drained.     Looking down at the lock   Wife hiding behind shades   The knife is soon to come.   My son's first Smallie   Here is one of many we caught that day   The boat gets a clean up.   So this is how to polish your boat the easy way, buy an electric polisher on sale for 20 bucks and let your son play with it.   I was going to post a few more, but that should do it for now.  Oh yeah.. ignore the time stamps on the pics, I didn't notice thaat it was wrong until it was too late.
Always nice when people share the pic's.  The summer pics, the weather outside..... starting to get the itch to pull out the boat for spring fishing.
Thanks Harry, it's always nice lookin back on the summer pictures !!  Looks like you had a few good days too
Great pics! Yummy perch!  I have got to find my way up to the Trent Severn system one day.
Nice pictures. Buy the way we have almost the same boat.
Nice photos, thanks for sharing.  A good looking feed of perch there
COOL,pics i love seeing other peoples summer fun pics,good scenery pics as well..cheers
